definition[0]: extreme excitement that makes people cry, laugh, shout etc in a way that is out of control
example[0]: In a fit of hysteria, Silvia blamed me for causing her father’s death.
definition[1]: a situation in which a lot of people feel fear, anger, or excitement, which makes them behave in an unreasonable way
example[1]: Since the general’s death, the population has been gripped by mass hysteria.
definition[2]: a medical condition that upsets someone’s emotions and makes them suddenly feel very nervous, excited, anxious etc
